basic.description: Supervised experience in applied dietetics. May be repeated to a maximum of twenty-four semester hours in a two-year period to meet CADE requirements for the Dietetics Internship. S/U grade only.
basic.subject: HUN
basic.title: Supervised Field Experience

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: DIE 5248, HUN 5242, HUN 5243, and instructor permission.
